sentence.text: We report a pair of siblings carrying a homozygous missense mutation p.P333L in cellular response to epidermal growth factor stimulus2 who exhibited global developmental delay, failure to thrive, dilated cardiomyopathy and epilepsy, ultimately leading to death in early childhood.

entity.text: cellular response to epidermal growth factor stimulus

sentence.text: cellular response to epidermal growth factor stimulus2-deficient zebrafish had skeletal muscle weakness, cardiac failure and small heads.

entity.text: cellular response to epidermal growth factor stimulus
